description:
Implement smart sticky navigation that hides when scrolling down (to maximize content space) and reappears when scrolling up. Keep critical context like page titles and key actions always accessible.

**Rationale:** Screen real estate is precious on mobile. Scroll-aware headers provide the best of both worlds: maximizing content visibility while keeping navigation readily accessible without forcing users to scroll to the top.
title: Add sticky headers with scroll-aware behavior
